Author: mprep

Body: ATTENTION: Due to the bounty incentivising posting on the ANN thread (which is an on-forum altcoin giveaway in any and all definitions), this thread is locked. There is zero tolerance for those blatantly breaking the "no on-forum altcoin giveaways" rule.

Author: EasyMine
Title: [ANN][ICO] easyMINE - Cryptocoin mining made simple [Bounty]
Body: We choose ETC because ETH is little overwhelmed right now. There was a discussion about it - we asked our preICO participants and we decided to stay completely on Ethereum Classic platform.  Regards.

Author: EasyMine
Title: [ANN][ICO] easyMINE - Cryptocoin mining made simple [Bounty]
Body: We are mostly from Poland. We are very open to new members and still looking for talented people ready to join our project (also remote work is accepted). Just send some info to: join@easymine.io  And yes - this is not a CLOUD MINING. We want to create software solution which helps you manage (configure, setup overclocking & bios flash, daily management and a lot of automatization features) your hardware in your location. easyMINE provide operating system and management console (web browser and mobile app).

Author: EasyMine
Title: [ANN][ICO] easyMINE - Cryptocoin mining made simple [Bounty]
Body: EMT tokens will not be mineable. We're creating a finite number and we'll not be issuing any more once the ICO is over.  As for what can be mined with easyMINE - any proof-of-work currency that's GPU-mineable, really. ETH, ETC, PascalCoin, Sia, Zcash, for sure. Any other, more obscure altcoins that fit the bill.
